header.title: Precise Similar Topics II - Collapsible Similar Topics
header.description: This add-on will allow users to show/hide the similar topics. It uses jQuery for a nice collapsing effect, and cookies to store the user's preference. This collapsible effect is based on a MOD authored by Christian Bullock.
header.author-notes: Note: This add-on uses jQuery. It will load jQuery from Google's CDN if it does not find jQuery has already been loaded. It is up to you to ensure that the inclusion of jQuery does not conflict with other MODs that may be including jQuery. This add-on only supports Prosilver and Prosilver-based styles.
